title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 150.2 - Use of aid
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 150.2 - Use of aid

State Regulations

No portion of any State aid paid to an institution of
higher education pursuant to the provisions of sections
6401
and
6401-a
of the

Education Law shall be used for the religious instruction or religious worship
or for the advancement or inhibition of religion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
150.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
